data.title: Great coffee
data.text: Great coffee place in schamburg, also wine if ur a wine lover. Great location coffee much better than Starbucks in my opinion.

data.title: Independent coffee house with delicous drinks.
data.text: Over 24 flavors for your coffee drink including house favorites such as liquid gold, monkey medley and raspberry rush.  There is something for everyone from coffee, tea, smoothies, craft beers and wine.  My favorite was a hot Earl Gray tea with lavender while my husband enjoyed a large liquid gold latte.  Farmers market on Fridays in the Town Square parking lot and open mic on Saturday nights.  I will be stopping in when I'm in town.
